alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Pendleton; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 5:27PM EDT until June 22 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Robertson County in northern Kentucky... Bracken County in northern Kentucky... Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 527 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Neville to Falmouth to near Williamstown, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Falmouth, Brooksville, Butler, Neville, Morgan, Moscow, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Willow Grove, Bradford, Stonewall, Powersville, Peach Grove, Ivor, Johnsville, Hittville, Goforth, Woolcutt, Neave and Milford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
